about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2016 by Maria Santos, Sparkle Clean has grown from a small local business to the most trusted cleaning service in our community. Our team of trained professionals uses eco-friendly products and proven techniques to deliver exceptional results.
about.subtitle: Why choose Sparkle Clean

owner.name: Maria Santos
owner.title: Owner & Operations Manager
owner.bio: Maria brings 12+ years of cleaning industry experience and a passion for perfection. She personally trains every team member to ensure consistent, high-quality service.

items.text: Sparkle Clean has been cleaning our home for 3 years. They're reliable, thorough, and use eco-friendly products. Highly recommend!
items.author: Lisa Johnson

items.text: The move-out cleaning was incredible! They got our security deposit back and the place looked better than when we moved in.
items.author: Robert Martinez

items.text: Professional, punctual, and thorough. Our office has never looked better. The team is friendly and trustworthy.
items.author: Amanda Thompson

items.text: Maria and her team are amazing! They pay attention to every detail and always go above and beyond.
items.author: David Chen

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

items.question: Are you insured and bonded?
items.answer: Yes, we carry full liability insurance and all team members are bonded for your protection. You can request proof of insurance at any time.

items.question: What products do you use?
items.answer: We use eco-friendly, non-toxic cleaning products that are safe for children and pets. All products are EPA-approved and Green Seal certified.

items.question: Do I need to be home during cleaning?
items.answer: No, many clients provide a key or code. We're fully bonded and trustworthy. You can go about your day while we make your space sparkle!

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. We'll re-clean any areas you're not happy with within 24 hours, free of charge.

items.question: How much does cleaning cost?
items.answer: Prices vary based on home size and service type. Regular house cleaning starts at $120, deep cleaning at $250. Contact us for a free, no-obligation quote.

items.question: Do you provide cleaning supplies?
items.answer: Yes! We bring all necessary supplies and equipment. If you have specific products you'd like us to use, just let us know.

items.question: Can I schedule recurring cleanings?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer weekly, bi-weekly, and monthly packages at discounted rates. Save 15% with a monthly plan.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We serve Springfield and surrounding areas within a 50-mile radius. Use our zip code checker or call to confirm service availability.

settings.productNote: Submit your quote request and we'll contact you with pricing within 24 hours. Same-day service available!
